enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description:
Toggles the mod.

<cy>To hide the "notification"</c> <cr>everywhere</c><cy>, disable this setting.</c>

visibilityInPlayLayer.name: Visibility When Playing Levels
visibilityInPlayLayer.description: Adjust the visibility of the "notification" when playing levels.

hideInLevelEditorLayer.name: Hide When Editing Levels
hideInLevelEditorLayer.description: Adjust the visibility of the "notification" when editing levels.

toneColorDown.name: Less Offensive Title Text (Color)
toneColorDown.description:
Enabled: <cy>yellow title text</c>.
Disabled: <cr>red title text</c>.

adaptiveText.name: Adaptive Body Text
adaptiveText.description: Changes the white text in the "notification" to show the name of the level you're playing, as well as other activities.

zOrder.name: Z Order
zOrder.description: Choose the Z order of the "notification". This is so you can better adjust things to avoid mod incompatibilities.

yPosition.name: Y Position
yPosition.description: Move the "notification" however you please, preferably to be more loyal to the Y position of the "notification" seen in Nullscapes.

backgroundWidth.name: Background Width
backgroundWidth.description: Adjust the width of the "notification" however you please, preferably to be more loyal to the width of the "notification" seen in Nullscapes.

backgroundOpacity.name: Background Opacity
backgroundOpacity.description: Adjust the opacity of the "notification" however you please, preferably to be more loyal to the opacity of the "notification" seen in Nullscapes (143 units).

titleFont.name: Title Font
titleFont.description:
Choose the font that the title text of the "notification" will use.

<cj>0 for Pusab (as seen in Nullscapes), -1 for Golden Pusab, and -2 for the font you see when viewing level comments.</c>
<cy>To use font numbers greater than 0: refer to the level editor for the font each number corresponds to, subtract that number by 1, and then put it here.</c>

bodyFont.name: Body Font
bodyFont.description:
Choose the font that the body text of the "notification" will use.

<cj>0 for Pusab (as seen in Nullscapes), -1 for Golden Pusab, and -2 for the font you see when viewing level comments.</c>
<cy>To use font numbers greater than 0: refer to the level editor for the font each number corresponds to, subtract that number by 1, and then put it here.</c>

logging.name: Logging
logging.description: Only enable this if you're told to do so.

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
